string.value: Cassandra says that something might have happened at Goldrich's Treasure Island. Go see #bCassandra#.

Cassandra says that you'll need a compass that will tell you the location of the Treasure Island. In order to make the compass, you'll need the #bEmpty Compass, Letter N for Compass, Letter E for Compass, Letter W for Compass, and Letter S for Compass#k. You can obtain the materials for the Golden Compass from the monsters in the Maple World. Find all the materials and return to Cassandra.

You gathered the #bEmpty Compass, Letter N for Compass, Letter E for Compass, and Letter W for Compass and delivered them to Cassandra. Cassandra made you the Golden Compass that will lead you to Goldrich's Treasure Vault.
What would happen to the entire Maple World if I, Cassandra, was not around? Not a day goes by without something else to worry about...

Goldrich, the richest person in all of MapleWorld, appears to be in trouble. Pigs have appeared in his treasure vault and they are eating all of his treasure! He has asked me to find someone who can handle those pigs. #b#h0#!#k, would you like to give it a shot? If you're successful, you might even receive some treasures in return...

In order to go to Goldrich's Treasure Vault, you'll need a #Golden Compass#k. If you bring me the materials for the compass, I'll make you the Golden Compass. Bring me the #bEmpty Compass, Letter N for Compass, Letter S for Compass, Letter W for Compass, and Letter E for Compass#k. You can obtain them from any monster.
Goldrich's Treasure Vault is filled with amazing treasures! Why wouldn't you want to go there?
You collected all the letters already? Wow, that was fast! Hand them over to me, and I'll turn them into a beautiful Golden Compass.
Here is the Golden Compass. #bDouble-click#k on it to enter Goldrich's Treasure Vault. Just remember that you can only use it until #rJuly 14th#k!

In order to go to Goldrich's Treasure Vault, you need to have a #Golden Compass#k. If you bring me the materials for the compass, I'll make you the Golden Compass. Bring me the #bEmpty Compass, Letter N for Compass, Letter S for Compass, Letter W for Compass, and Letter E for Compass#k. You can obtain them from any monster.
